mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN message_receive_user_seq = #{currentUserId} THEN message_send_user_seq ELSE message_receive_user_seq END AS message_receive_user_seq, message_date, message_content FROM messages WHERE message_seq IN ( SELECT MAX(message_seq) FROM messages WHERE message_send_user_seq = #{currentUserId} OR message_receive_user_seq = #{currentUserId} GROUP BY CASE WHEN message_send_user_seq = #{currentUserId} THEN message_receive_user_seq ELSE message_send_user_seq END ) ORDER BY message_date DESC
